Text: FW TXU Gas Distribution Enbridge Consumers Gaspst Can you make the change Thanks Richard Original Message From Sonnonstine Max Sent Wednesday October PM To Deming Richard Wallumrod Ellen Subject TXU Gas Distribution Enbridge Consumers Gas Rich Ellen We have some problems with the following two counterparties TXU Gas Distribution Enbridge Consumers Gas For TXU Gas Distribution this is a unconsolidated division of TXU Gas Company and all deals booked under TXU Gas Distribution should be confirmed as TXU Gas Company I understand this is not the case For Enbridge Consumers Gas this is not a valid entity At some point it will be a correct name but for now deals should be confirmed and booked under Consumers Gas Co Ltd Each has a relatively recent deal booked to it that need to be changed as described above Sitara for TXU and for Enbridge Consumers Gas Please advise if there is something I need to do from my end to get this issue resolved Thanks Max Sonnonstine x

RE Sempra Energy Solutions LLCdo not have any master type documents with Sempra Energy Solutions LLC I will send out the GTC confirm where both enron and sempra have to sign Thanks Richard x Original Message From Hyvl Dan Sent Tuesday June AM To Deming Richard Subject Re Sempra Energy Solutions LLC Richard This is getting out of hand Do we have any master type documents with any Sempra entities and if so what is the relationship of the current party to the one we may have a master with If we have no master then of course we need to have a fully signed GTC confirm signed by both enron and sempra Thank you Richard NRON PM To Dan J CT cc Subject Sempra Energy Solutions LLC Dan Please find below details of Phy Gas deals with GTC agreements Deal Date Deal No VE Buyer Sempra Energy Solutions LLC Seller ENA Start Date End Date Firm Volume day Price SBORDERSOCALNGIMI plus USD Delivery Point Southern California Gas Company Blythe Southern Border Please let me know if you need any more details Thanks Richard x

Octagon Resources Inc Cc Stacy We Bryant Frihart have a deal where we have a buy and a sell for the same price volumes etc Basically it is a wash However on the buy the cp is wanting there receivable in The comments in the system read ENA will pay Octagon on January by wire My question is does this have to be worded a certain way on the confirm and if so can you please provide this to me Below is the buy for you to view Thanks Richard x

RE CoSteel Inc new deal YD Cc Debra Do you need to see this confirm or can I attach the same language you give me for deal YD Thanks Richard x Original Message From Sonnonstine Max Sent Thursday October AM To Deming Richard Perlingiere Debra Dickson Stacy E Cc Wallumrod Ellen Subject RE CoSteel Inc new deal YD CoSteel had another deal from yesterday that needs to go out with the same credit terms This new deal is YD Please attach credit to confirm and send out Thanks Max

RE CoSteel Inc new deal YDHere it is Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Thursday October AM To Deming Richard Subject RE CoSteel Inc new deal YD Yes please send the confirm Original Message From Deming Richard Sent Thursday October AM To Sonnonstine Max Perlingiere Debra Dickson Stacy E Cc Wallumrod Ellen Subject RE CoSteel Inc new deal YD Debra Do you need to see this confirm or can I attach the same language you give me for deal YD Thanks Richard x Original Message From Sonnonstine Max Sent Thursday October AM To Deming Richard Perlingiere Debra Dickson Stacy E Cc Wallumrod Ellen Subject RE CoSteel Inc new deal YD CoSteel had another deal from yesterday that needs to go out with the same credit terms This new deal is YD Please attach credit to confirm and send out Thanks Max

RE CoSteel Inc Cc Sorry some reason I was thinking I was waiting on you Original Message From Sonnonstine Max Sent Wednesday October AM To Perlingiere Debra Dickson Stacy E Cc Wallumrod Ellen Deming Richard Subject CoSteel Inc Good Morning Enclosed is a worksheet for both an omnibus and a master physical for CoSteel Inc The omnibus pertains to a trade executed yesterday and perhaps other trades executed before a master is put in place Please forward the omnibus to Ellen and Richard in confirms with a copy to me Thanks Max Sonnonstine File CoSteelxls File CoSteel Omnibusxls

RE Anderson ExplorationOk but can we get the book admin or someone to put these comments into sitara so there is no confusion Original Message From Storey Geoff Sent Tuesday October AM To Deming Richard Subject RE Anderson Exploration Please do not send out a confirm I added notes to the tagg tickets ECC is going to confirm and the deal involves an agency agreement Original Message From Deming Richard Sent Tuesday October AM To Storey Geoff Subject Anderson Exploration Geoff Let me know if this confirm is ok to be sent out And if you could I need a fax number for the cp File Exportdoc Thanks Richard x

FW PetroCanada Hydrocarbons IncOriginal Message From Deming Richard Sent Friday October PM To Storey Geoff Cc Wallumrod Ellen Subject FW PetroCanada Hydrocarbons Inc Geoff Just wondering if you had a chance to review the below email Original Message From Deming Richard Sent Thursday October PM To Storey Geoff Cc Wallumrod Ellen Subject PetroCanada Hydrocarbons Inc Geoff I am sending three confirms for you to view however the comments on these deals are switchable rights we can point transport to secondary delivery I am unclear what you are trying to do please pick one of the selections below to go in the confirms that stats what you are trying to say Also what is the secondary delivery point Buyer has the option to take gas at either Delivery Point upon proper notice to Seller prior to the pipeline nomination deadline for any Period of Delivery Prior to the pipeline nomination deadline either party may select a secondary Delivery Point from among list points or any other mutually agreeable point Buyer at its option and upon proper notice to Seller prior to the pipeline nomination deadline shall have the right to change Delivery Points up to times during the Period of Delivery Thanks Richard x
